Current Schedule

Sat Naam...

Gurumantra Kaur is now teaching several regular sessions at a variety of studios in southern New Hampshire!

Tuesday's at 7:00 pm

  • Where: Ohana Yoga, 44 Cedar St., Contoocook
  • What: Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bhajan
  • When: Each Tuesday evening beginning at 7 PM

Please note that there will be no class on Tuesday, January 17. All dates in February are tentative and will be finalized shortly.

Saturday's at 8:30 am

  • Where: Concord YMCA, 15 N State St, Concord
  • What: Aqua Yoga inspired by Kundalini
  • When: Each Saturday morning beginning at 8:30 AM

Please note that there will be no class on the following Saturdays: November 5, December 3, January 14, All Weekends in February, March 4, and March 11. All dates in February are tentative and will be finalized shortly.

Other Sessions

Check out our Facebook page for updates on other sessions that are offered. Gurumantra Kaur fills in as needed at Soul Yoga in Peterborough, NH

If the current sessions don't fit into your schedule, I also do sessions in your home, one on one or a small group. If there's enough demand for a class, additional times can be offered! Please email me at yoga@gurumantrakaur.com to let me know you're interested!

About YogiSTRONG

YogiSTRONG is an independent Yoga practice, owned and operated by Gurumantra Kaur (Josephine Fanelli). Based in Concord, NH, Gurumantra is an instructor of Kundalini Yoga as taught by Yogi Bhajan.

Subscribe to our mailing list for updates on class offerings, health and wellness tips, meditations, and more!
